SEARCH
Package main.java.nn.layers

Class Convolution

java.lang.Object
main.java.nn.layers.Layer
main.java.nn.layers.Convolution
Direct Known Subclasses:
Convolution2D
public abstract class Convolution extends Layer
Abstract base class for convolution layers in neural networks. This class defines the common functionalities for convolution operations, including the handling of kernels and biases.

  • Method Details

    • forward

      public abstract Tensor forward(MultiDimObject tensor)
      Processes the input through the convolution layer using configured kernels and strides. This method must be implemented by subclasses to define specific convolution behaviors.
      Specified by:
      forward in class Layer
      Parameters:
      tensor - The input MultiDimObject, typically a Tensor, to be convolved.
      Returns:
      A Tensor representing the output of the convolution operation.

    • set_execution_mode

      public void set_execution_mode(ModelSettings.executionMode mode)
      Sets the execution mode for the layer, adjusting how tensors within this layer, such as kernels and biases, work (parallel of serial execution).
      Specified by:
      set_execution_mode in class Layer
      Parameters:
      mode - The execution mode as defined in ModelSettings.executionMode.

    • get_parameters

      public ArrayList<MultiDimObject> get_parameters()
      Retrieves all trainable parameters of this convolution layer, including kernels and potentially biases.
      Specified by:
      get_parameters in class Layer
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of MultiDimObject representing the trainable parameters of this layer.
